notesStmt.note: "Viz. I. Of grace growing and increasing. II. The first and last in suffering-work. III. The way to obtain a sure and great reward. IV. The two witnesses and their testimony. V. The uncertainty of the world. VI. Mans wrath against Gods shall turn to God's praise. VII. Comfort to mourners for the loss of the solemn assemblies. VIII. The evil of unbelief in departing from God. IX. A warning to apostates."
